name: Richard
description:
Let’s start with who I am,
I am one of those good guys, who is easy going. To me, life is to short. I am confident, but not cocky, humble even shy at times, fun and full of energy. I can be funny at times, not afraid to laugh at myself or with others. I have a way to make people smile. I can appreciate the small things in life, that others may find insignificant. I believe that things will come my way, if I try to do the right thing. Well I’m certainly not perfect, after all I am still just a guy. I still make mistakes, But I do believe I have great qualities and good values to share, that’s part of my success..Things I like. working out & playing sports, the beach, the pool, sunny days, people watching it’s a blast, Playing cards.Others I enjoy, Staying in bed stealing the covers on a rainy Sunday morning, Spicy foods, Going on road trips.
